name: Kanopi Studios
description:
Kanopi Studios designs, builds, and supports websites for clients that want to make an impact. We create clean, modern, and user-focused sites that ensure your visitors build a lasting connection with your brand.
We are a fully distributed team that hires the best and brightest web design and development talent across North America, but our heart and soul (and many of our staff) are in San Francisco and the state of California. All "Kanopians" are senior-level experts, and many have been thought leaders in our tech space for over a decade.
Kanopi Studios is a Drupal Association member with several Acquia certified Drupal developers, and we are the lead organizers of the Bay Area Drupal Camp (BADCamp). We also are regular speakers at both Drupal and WordPress camps.
